wikipedia.title: Funkadelic
wikipedia.extract: Funkadelic was an American band formed in 1968 and active until 1982. The band and its sister act Parliament, both led by George Clinton, pioneered the funk music culture of that decade. Relative to its sister act, Funkadelic pursued a heavier, psychedelic rock-oriented sound. They released acclaimed albums such as Maggot Brain (1971) and One Nation Under a Groove (1978).
